wikipedia_page.main: George Herbert Hamilton Bryan OBE (9 April 1921 – 20 September 2013) was a British businessman who was the managing director of Drayton Manor Theme Park. He founded the company with his wife Vera, in 1949.

response: George Bryan (1731–1791) was a Pennsylvania businessman, statesman and politician of the Revolutionary era.
George Bryan may also refer to:
*George Bryan (actor) (fl. 1586–1613), actor in English Renaissance theatre
*George Bryan (politician, died 1843), Irish Member of Parliament in the British House of Commons
*George Bryan (British businessman) (1921–2013), British founder and owner of Drayton Manor Theme Park
* George Bryan, 92, British businessman, founder of Drayton Manor Theme Park.Telegraph: George Bryan
